content: make a warm snug and cozy fitted beanie with loops & threads charisma yarn using this free pattern this beanie crochet pattern includes instructions on how to make an adult women s and men s sized beanie and also has tips on how to down size the women s pattern to make a small adult women s/teen/large child sized beanie the pattern is suitable for beginner crocheters as it uses only basic crochet stitches materials required are a k hook or an l hook and one ball of loops & threads charisma yarn paying attention to gauge for this pattern is strongly recommended as not all charisma yarn is equal in bulk/weight the finished women s beanie will measure approximately 8 in length and the men s approximately 8 5 in length it can easily be adjusted for a more personalized fit thank you for stopping by my ravelry store i hope you enjoy the pattern stacey in stitches
